Package dev.efekos.classes.api.registry

Class PerkRegistry

java.lang.Object
dev.efekos.classes.api.registry.PerkRegistry
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRegistry<IPerk>
public final class PerkRegistry extends Object implements IRegistry<IPerk>
Main registry used for perks. Works as a server service. You can use ServicesManager.getRegistration(Class) to get the service created by Classes
